title: Pangolin Project Manager
body:
As per the post on the Governance forum https://gov.pangolin.exchange/t/pangolin-project-manager/1221 I'd like to gauge the community support for my proposal to be the Pangolin Project manager. 
After this snapshot vote, if I receive enough votes I will then setup the formal governance on chain vote.
author: 0x72C397908Cb93d1B569BBB0Ff8d3D26B7b21d730
